pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Your Privacy Matters to Us LuckyHarbor 18+ Home About us Casino Сontact Privacy Policy LuckyHarbor is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you visit our website or use our services. We may collect personal information such as your name, contact details, payment information, and preferences when you make a reservation or interact with our website. We also collect non-personal information such as your IP address, browser type, and browsing behavior. Your personal information is used to process bookings, provide services, and improve your experience at LuckyHarbor. We may also use your information to send you promotional offers, updates, and important communications related to your stay. We may disclose your personal information to third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, processing payments, or delivering services. These providers are contractually obligated to protect your information and only use it for specified purposes. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze website usage, and personalize content and advertisements. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. With your consent, we may send you marketing communications about our products, services, and special offers. You can opt-out of receiving these communications at any time by following the unsubscribe instructions provided in the communication. LuckyHarbor@gmail.com. Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not operated or controlled by LuckyHarbor. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third parties. We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of these websites before providing any personal information. LuckyHarbor does not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 18 without parental consent. If we discover that we have inadvertently collected information from a child, we will promptly delete it. Your personal information may be transferred to and processed in countries outside of your jurisdiction where our service providers are located. By using our services, you consent to the transfer of your information to these countries. We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices and legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website or by other means. You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information held by LuckyHarbor. You may also have the right to restrict or object to certain processing activities. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below. LuckyHarbor@gmail.com. If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us using the contact information provided at the end of this policy. By using our website or services, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy. If you are a resident of California, you may have additional rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA). Please refer to our CCPA Privacy Notice for more information about your rights and how to exercise them. If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you may have rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Please refer to our GDPR Compliance Statement for more information about your rights and how we comply with GDPR requirements. LuckyHarbor is the data controller responsible for the processing of your personal information under this Privacy Policy. Our contact details are provided at the end of this policy. This Privacy Policy was last updated on [insert date]. Any changes or updates to this policy will be effective upon posting the revised policy on our website. By using our website or services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy and agree to its terms and conditions.
